That was @Eric Wieser's doing: it looks like he moved it from somewhere else.
Yeah, I can tell the message was moved from elsewhere. But regardless of the move -- even as the poll author, I don't seem to be able to add options until there's a question on the poll.

I wrote the message

/poll
What about this one?
Aha, got it.

To close the loop, I've relayed the report to https://chat.zulip.org/#narrow/channel/9-issues/topic/polls.20with.20no.20question.20cannot.20have.20questions.20added.20to.20them and we'll see if someone picks it up.

We're racing toward the finish line for the 10.0 release right now, and I can't say that this bug will be a top priority before we get that out the door.

If the Zulip maintainers get pinged for movements in this channel, I am sure that they are loving this discussion.

I can't speak for other Zulip developers, but I've configured my notifications here to be pretty low-urgency, so don't hesitate to discuss or play around with things in this topic on that account. I do love the discussion! :)
Filed as https://github.com/zulip/zulip/issues/33672.
